name: MaruKana
description:
Note: The browser version is missing a couple features and I have no clue why. For the full experience, please download the .zip file :)

MaruKana is a small project that I put together in just 3 hours! You can use it to revise sets of Hiragana and Katakana - がんばって！

Check out my other work, too! ^^
